Free Online Games >> Food Games >> Play Family Restaurant Game
73% 27%
Rating: Family Restaurant
a Free Online Food Game
PLAY GAME NOW!
• Title: Family Restaurant
• Description: The family restaurant is loosing business. It has recently lost two of its three stars and you are asked to save it from further demise.
It is your job to make sure that every dish that leaves your kitchen looks as good as it does in the picture on the menu. Keep your customers happy and youll see that the company is back on track in no time.
• Instructions: Create neat dishes without making the customer wait a long time.
Click one of the order at the lower part of the screen. In the window that pops up you should arrange the ingredients in such a way that it looks like the picture at the top left part of the screen. The ingredients will be presented one after the other and should all be used. Finish be pressing off. Some other dishes need a special process to make, press the learn button at the beginning of a level to see how its done. Check inside the game for more instructions on how to play Family Restaurant.
• Category: Food Games
• Game Play Count: 3773
• Keywords: Family Restaurant
• Game Reviews: Reviews of Family Restaurant
